subject: Automobile Racing
Le Mans Auto Race
lead_paragraph: Huge teams and companies are not the only winners at Le Mans. This unique race has 56 cars in four categories, with only the top category of prototypes reaping the glory of the overall victory.
snippet: Huge teams and companies are not the only winners at Le Mans. This unique race has 56 cars in four categories, with only the top category of prototypes reaping the glory of the overall victory.
